channel.title: CVE Feed for rails -- actionview
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rails -- actionview

item.title: CVE-2020-5267|2024-08-04T08:22:09.079Z -- rails -- actionview
item.description: In ActionView before versions 6.0.2.2 and 5.2.4.2, there is a possible XSS vulnerability in ActionView's JavaScript literal escape helpers. Views that use the `j` or `escape_javascript` methods may be susceptible to XSS attacks. The issue is fixed in versions 6.0.2.2 and 5.2.4.2.
